products.title: Blooming Meadow Linen Ruby Roman Blind
products.metadescription:
The blooming meadow linen ruby roman blind is full of texture, colour, pattern and warmth, and makes a remarkable window dressing for many many schemes.   
Warm shades such as this work effortlessly with darker natural grains, whilst the linen mix fabric gives it a helping hand,

products.title: Blooming Meadow Linen Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription:
Soft, light and creamy, the blooming meadow linen blue is perfect for adding sophisticated charm to your home. It has a lovely open weave that adds endless texture too.   
And with natural influences, this blind works wonders in a similar scheme. Plenty of foliage, organic shade

products.title: Blooming Meadow Linen Amethyst Roman Blind
products.metadescription:
Bold amethyst, zesty citronella, elephant grey and neutral blush. The blooming meadow linen amethyst roman blind has a wonderfully diverse colour palette that works wonderfully together.
